评论详情: These are by far my go to joggers.  The waist is not tight at all but still hold my menopausal belly in which I love.  They fit loose and comfortable.  I would recommend to size down one.  I’m usually a Medium in most joggers.  I have washed and worn these ton with no pilling. I am 5’2, 145lbs and I got the small.

The waist band is completely smooth, which is perfect and flattering. Other joggers have an elastic band around the top but these use a compression stretch. Nice fabric and very thick. Highly recommend Also, get your usual size. I ordered a medium and then a small. The small fit better, they may run a tad large even.

评论概述: Very comfortable but waist is inconsistent
评论详情: I have a few pairs of these pants and I really love to wear them to workout and to the airport. They do not slide down but the sizing is very off. The legs fit but the elastic in the same size with different pairs does vary. Some are made larger and smaller than others (I guess this is amazon fashion?)  They wash well and are not too oversized for when I take barre/pilates classes. They are especially great for the certain days out of the month that I do not want to wear very tight pants to workout.

It's only my first day wearing these (in black/animal print), but I've tried what seems like ALLLLL the joggers and leggings out there, so I have a pretty good idea of what works for me or not. I'm 5'6 and they hit just above the ankle, which I like. They're relaxed in the legs but not the the point of being Hammer pants. They actually have more of a tailored look. The waistband is high and not restrictive. It rolled down a bit when I was sitting, but that was easy to fix-- I'd rather have that than a too-tight waistband that digs in or gives me extra rolls around my midsection. The shiny animal print is SO CUUUUUUTE! Can definitely dress them up or down. This morning I wore them out with a collared shirt and sweater, and this afternoon I'm wearing them around the house with a black half-zip sweatshirt. Both look great. It's below freezing in Chicago today, and with a long coat they're fine for going from your car to a building and back. Would wear for running a few errands, but not for extended time outside (like walking from the train to work). I'm hoping these will be a new staple for Fall/Winter/Spring, and maybe on less hot summer days.

Like others have mentioned, Amazon recommended a Large but I had to return it and order medium. The medium fit perfectly but after all day wear, it tends to slide down so expect adjustments. I ordered the black cammo and it's buttery soft. I'm 5'4" and the medium is a perfect length whereas the large was too long.

Very nice joggers. Super soft and stretchy! As far as sizing. I’ve ordered an extra small, small and medium which all fit. The mediums are just slightly loose in the thigh. The reason I’m ordering the different sizes is I think they run short in the length and I was trying to get them longer without compromising the fit.

I am the first to admit that I thought joggers looked ridiculous. I absolutely hate when my son wears them. But I saw an influencer wearing these and pairing them with a cute pair of sneakers and a sweater so I decided to give them a try. I love how they fit. I love the elastic waistband. They are not baggy, but very slimming. I am usually a large and purchased a M for that slim fit.

I recently tried the G Gradual Women's Joggers, and they have been amazing! These high-waisted yoga pants are perfect for everything from workouts to lounging around. The material is soft and breathable, making them super comfortable for any activity.  The pockets are a fantastic addition, providing enough space to carry essentials like my phone and keys. The high waist offers great support and stays put during workouts, while the loose leggings give a relaxed fit without being too baggy.  These joggers are versatile and stylish, making them a great addition to any wardrobe. Whether I'm hitting the gym, running errands, or just chilling at home, these pants are my new favorite. Highly recommend the G Gradual Women's Joggers for their comfort, practicality, and style!  The only reason I gave 4 stars is because after wearing them.for a while they seem to stretch out a little around the waist. Maybe ordering a size down would do the trick.

评论概述: Great texture, lightweight but really baggy
评论详情: I love the feel and weight of these pants. They’re super stretchy which I love HOWEVER they run big! I’m typically a large in yoga pants and ordered a medium in these. Going to return and get a small instead.  They’re baggy around stomach band and very baggy around thighs.

Yes I like these. They fit well with exception to leg length… they were a little too long for me, but I’m 5’2”. I altered them myself. I plan on buying more though in different colors. Love them..they are comfy.

But I have to say I’m so tired of the size guides being so incredibly wrong!! I had to send these back because I measure 44” in my hips and according to the size guide I even needed to order bigger. Well I got an XL and while super soft and super comfy they were a bit bigger than I’m comfortable with in the waist and my waist measures around 37”, and slightly baggy in thigh bum area. YOU GUYS, the waist sizing doesn’t even go up that high on the inches chart. Seriously what’s the point if they aren’t even going to remotely be somewhat accurate. I have worked from home for the last 4.5 years and have gained a lot of weight, it’s bad enough not having cloths that fit but attempting to order based on the size charts acting like you’re much bigger than you are is down right insulting. My other main measurements just for anyone a similar size that I pray will read this, I stand right about 5’7” and I’m 165lbs. Please do not size up unless you really want super loose fitting. I do think I could have made the XL work provided I wasn’t intending on putting my phone in the pocket when taking my dogs out, however, since that is my intention and there’s no draw string I don’t think it would have been safe not for me, not for my neighbors! Lol to add insult to injury I have to wait to reorder a size large until I get back from an overnight trip with my mom, unfortunately my refund was processed too late in the day for me to get next day processing, I’m bummed! I was really hoping to take a new pair of cozy pants to the hot springs. Alas I shall have to wait, but please ladies I beg you don’t “follow” the chart like I did. I’ll try to add an update once I get the appropriate size.

I’ve purchased these before in a size small and then again in size medium. I’m 5’8” tall, 130 pounds. I prefer the more snug fit of the small actually, but the mediums are quite comfortable too. They’re just more loose. I bought the mediums hoping they would be longer, but they are only about a 1/2 inch longer so it didn’t make a huge difference.
nice quality
I wish these were of a thicker material otherwise they are perfect.

评论概述: Love the fit not the color.
评论详情: I love this brand! I have a couple different styles from them. This one is not my favorite. They are thinner than my others. I think if they were a darker color I may reach for them more often. Overall great fit and decent quality. Love the pockets! I would checkout their other items too

Soft and cute. I ordered a XXL when a xl would've definitely fit me. I've lost weight and still struggling with what size I need to get,  but I also don't like anything super tight. They will do. If I order another pair I'll definitely get a xl.
I was expecting the fabric to be thick and warm.  I will wear them to work out instead.
Fit is great and they are buttery soft!

评论概述: I liked these the best of the 5 different brands that I ordered
评论详情: BC they have the most comfortable, flattering fit, IMO. I am 5'5", 125lbs; I am more of a "ruler" than an "hourglass". I wanted to replace some lyocell joggers that have faded and lose their shape after a few minutes of wear. I ordered Small from G Gradual and 4 other top jogger brands sold on Amazon. What sold me on this brand was the comfortable fit... after trying on all 5 brands several times, I started to appreciate that these G Gradual joggers *don't* have a thin elastic band inside at the top of the waist. The waistband is wide and smooth and stretchy like a yoga pant and it makes them so much more comfortable than those with elastic inside- I am often bloated thanks to colitis. The fit on the backside is more flattering with these. Note- they don't have a gathered, drawstring waist either, so it seems like a smoother, leaner fit- and No strings to loop in the front. I'm sending the other 4 back and ordering more G Gradual joggers in other colors. I hope they wash/wear well (fingers crossed)
These fit exactly as I hoped - higher waist and good pockets with not too tight or too baggy legs. Fitted at ankles. The fabric was a little thinner than I wanted but it’s still ok.
Fit great, super comfortable and stylish

I was looking to buy a few joggers for an upcoming cruise and took a chance on these. I have trouble buying bottoms because my hips are bigger than the rest of me which can make pants really tight or draw attention to my hips.  I noticed right away that the pockets are placed perfectly and do not draw attention to my hips nor do they make my hips look bigger so right away I love that!  The material is nice but it does make noise when you walk. I like that the waistband is flat and doesn't have a string or anything but the waist band rolls down a bit which doesn't really show but I did not notice. Another thing because of the material, I noticed these joggers move a bit. If they were just a tad heavier in weight, they might not move but I am having to tug at them to put them back in place.  Good to have one pair but not ones I would buy multiples of. I am 5'2", 145 lbs, pearshape figure and the medium fits me pretty well.
These joggers are AMAZING - I love them. So comfy!!! True to size.
I love these so much.  Great fit.  I bought a large.  I weigh. 135.  5'2".  If I was taller they would be too short for my taste.  I love the pockets and the material is very comfortable.
I need pants that were comfy and casual that weren’t leggings and these are perfect! I got a size medium and they were great.

评论概述: Thin, stretchy material - I have several pairs!
评论详情: These are great for shoulder seasons casual wear and for working out!

The fabric was unexpected for me. It has a slight sheen and is very thin. I thought it would be slightly more fleece-like. The fit is fine. True to size.  I’ll keep it, but I wish there was something warmer and thicker.

评论概述: G Gradual Joggers: A Wardrobe Essential
评论详情: G Gradual has consistently delivered high-quality and comfortable clothing, and their Women’s Joggers High Waisted Yoga Pants are no exception. These joggers are a must-have for any wardrobe, offering unmatched comfort and versatility.  Crafted from a soft and cozy fabric, these joggers feel like a gentle embrace. Their high waist and elastic waistband provide a snug and secure fit, ensuring they stay in place during even the most vigorous workouts or casual outings.  The loose-fitting design of these joggers makes them ideal for various activities. They can be effortlessly dressed with a stylish top and heels or kept casual with a t-shirt and sneakers. Their ability to transition seamlessly from the gym to brunch makes them a true wardrobe chameleon.  The lightweight fabric of these joggers makes them suitable for all seasons. They provide warmth during cooler months and remain breathable in warmer temperatures, making them a valuable addition to any closet.  G Gradual’s Women’s Joggers High-Waisted Yoga Pants are an exceptional investment in enhancing your wardrobe. Their unparalleled comfort, flattering fit, and versatile styling options make them a must-have for women of all ages and activity levels.

I have a lot of troubl trying to find work out pants that fit me comfortably and these are a dream. They are so comfortable and I love them. Will be buying another color!  After ordering another pair and wearing these joggers to the gym I still like them but the waist does fall down enough that I find I'm constantly pulling them up which I really don't like.
Comfy for work or play. You can dress them up or down as wanted. So comfy and soft. True to size IMO

They are so perfect. They look exactly like the promo photos. They fit well, and the fabric is thick. I'm very pleased. I usually wear Medium for bottom, but I followed everyone's suggestions and got a Small. It's perfect.
They are so soft and comfortable Gray is a good color I the wide waist. Ordering black next
The fit was OK but lighter material than I expected & would be for warmer weather.  Shows all your flaws.
Very comfortable and fit great

评论概述: A Flattering Yet Surprisingly Comfy Jogger!
评论详情: These joggers were such a pleasant surprise!  The brown color is perfect for a fall, and the cut of the joggers is flattering yet so comfy when you pull them on!  Not too baggy in the tush area, with a little bit more room in the legs for sitting and just hanging out.  Will definitely order another pair in black for the winter months!

Ordered size small. I’m 5’6” and the pants were too short for me. It also runs small elsewhere (I am a USA size 2 and these fit in the waist/seat with no allowance for any weight gain). Seemed comfy otherwise.
I am 5’4” 137lbs. Bought a medium. Fit is PERFECT! Not clingy and VERY comfortable!

评论概述: Just buy them! They are great!
评论详情: These are by far my most favorite pair of joggers. They look nice and can even be dressed up a bit. They are so comfortable and figure flattering. You can’t go wrong with them. Wish they made this exact style a thicker material for the winter months, but these are phenomenal.
Fits perfect great material very comfortable
So comfortable! Now have one pair of every color! Dress up or down! Perfect for a retired, now substitute teacher!

评论概述: The sizing for me was too big
评论详情: I usual wear a 16(Xxl) but these were too big and being 5ft too long.  They are comfortable and the quality of material is good. They are washable but I suggest tumble dry low or air dry. They are good for early fall or late spring but not mid winter or tropical summer.
Great- comfy and soft- but pills a lot after just 3 washes. Don’t think these will hold up long term.
Loved them but I’m 4”11 & they were too long bunched up around ankles. Had to return.
I rarely write reviews but had to for these. They are awesome. Very high quality and so comfortable.  The fit is perfect.  Lose enough to be flattering and comfortable but not baggy. Buy them!
Love these joggers. Great fit size medium. Lightweight, I’m tall and they fit in the length and don’t roll at the waist. 👍

Buy these!!! I am a personal trainer and have looked for years at all the name brand joggers trying to find a pair that is comfy, light weight, and actually fits my body right. I’m 5’4, athletic build, about 160 pounds. Small waist with a big booty. Joggers never fit me right!! I’m so obsessed with these, literally ordering more in different colors right now!!!  Only thing I’ll say, is to order whatever size leggings you would typically order for these pants. I typically order a medium, but like my joggers to fit a bit bigger, so I ordered up to a large. I do like the way they fit, however, I will be ordering mediums next. I happen to love the loose waistband, but a medium will fit me a little bit better.  Super soft, breathable, not see through, still gives good shape, and great quality for a really great price point!!
These joggers are well made and fit as expected. The material was on the thin side and did not look flattering on me so I returned them.

Based on Amazon’s recommendations of a small, I actually got a medium since another pair similar in style to this was too small, so I returned it, and got these- but sized up. I’m glad I did- I wanted the true jogger look of more oversized but not baggy. The waist is a tad bigger than I’d like, and the crotch is a little low- but do I want to pay Lululemon prices? Haha. I’m still deciding on whether to keep these or not, but the color is beautiful, the are soft, are on the thinner side, and definitely not true jogger material (think lululemon material that swishes when you walk)- but they are great for the price. Wear skin colored or super light colored undies with this ivory color for sure! (Just a tip!)
I have been looking for a pair of joggers in this material because it’s so durable. These are PERFECT! They do not hug the body too tight as leggings do. I’m getting them in every color!

These joggers fit so well, they are good quality material, and most importantly the waist is comfortable. Most joggers squeeze my waist and give a muffin top. There is no tight elastic waistband on these like others. I will be ordering more colors. The only con is they came to me smelling strongly of other woman perfume. Like maybe they had been washed and worn my someone? I washed them and the smell is still there but I will try vinegar next time. Only my first time washing and wearing so I cannot say about how they hold up over time. They are a legging material but with a fit like a jogger.

These joggers are perfect for ladies who don’t like wearing shorts in the gym. Super stretchy, and lightweight. Perfect for hot Texas summers. I love riding bikes or hiking in these. They look nice enough to wear out, I took a pair on my trip to Yellowstone and they were awesome there too. I might not wear these in cold climates or the winter but they were a great thin layering piece bundled up in my sleeping bag when it was freezing outside. Highly recommend.  Update: I still adore these pants but FYI they do seem to stretch out quite a bit. I’m ordering my third pair a size smaller so hopefully when they stretch out after a few wears they will fit the way I want them to. My first pair are now pretty saggy/ trying not to weigh my second pair down too much by putting heavy keys and my phone in my pockets like I did with my first pair.

评论概述: Ehhh not what I was expecting
评论详情: I was looking for warmer joggers to wear during fall and winter. However, these are not it, these are more like leggings, super stretchy, but not what I was expecting.
These pants are super soft and comfortable. be to wear all day without complaint.

Really love these pants, very comfortable and don’t collect pet hair. I have two cats, 1 long and short hair and minimally will the hair get caught in the fabric.  These joggers are also really comfortable. I’ve already purchased other colors.  Only downside is they can stretch a little and at 5’3” I wish there was a petite/short option for the length.  But again, great pants- wear them hiking, yoga and day to day!

评论概述: jogger is well made; fabric is soft and substantial. Love the fit and size .
评论详情: Love the overall design and fit. Use the jogger as my workout outfit.

评论概述: Color not as described/listed, Lavender instead of Cosmic Blue
评论详情: These are OK, comfortable. I was drawn by the color shown and described as "Cosmic Blue". What I received is a lighter color, and the package label clearly says "Lavender". I thought it was a mistake, wrong item sent. So I put in a return request to be replaced with the correct item. Another package arrived, same label - "Lavender". I have returned the first one and am trying to decide if I'll keep the 2nd or not. Its not a bad color, but not what I expected.  Also to note: I checked out the 1st pair, the legs on it are a bit shorter than on the 2nd pair I rec'd, so the products seem inconsistent, so be careful.
Love these pants, need in different colors, comfort, size, material thickness

I didn't want to spend money on Lululemon Align Joggers, and these looked fairly close. I've never worn Align joggers, but I just got some Lululemon Fast & Free leggings and the material is very similar. It's a bit shinier than it looks in the images here, the material is really comfortable and these probably the most comfortable and flattering joggers I've gotten from Amazon. I'm always trying to find a really cute and comfy pair and this is the best I've found. They do run big - I usually wear a Small, but bought an XS and there's still extra room and they're a bit loose, but not as much as most joggers. Besides looking and feeling good, my other main issue with most pants in the waist is too tight. I want comfort, not to feel like I'm being squeezed, and these are the only pants that have a waist that isn't too tight without also having overly baggy legs. I'll likely buy another pair in another color!

True to size. Very soft.  Length-right above angle. High rise waist. I’m 5’6”. I do not like leggings very much. These fit in between leggings and joggers. Not skin tight, but also not loose. Would buy again

I love the fit of these! They are soft and so comfortable. Easy to dress up for a business casual look or wear as lounge wear. As a kindergarten teacher they allow for movement and keep me comfortable all day. The material is nice and thick as well so not see through!
These pants are super comfortable and fit really well.

These joggers are hands down my favorite! I have them in two colors, and I wear them all the time. The comfort level is off the charts—soft, cozy, and perfect for lounging or running errands. The fit is amazing, with a flattering cut that isn’t too tight or too loose.  I got my true size, and they fit perfectly, so no need to size up or down. They hold up great in the wash, and the quality is excellent. If you’re looking for joggers that combine style, comfort, and a perfect fit, these are a must-have!

I usually like my Ggradual leggings but there’s something off in the sizing of this pair. I’m 186# 5’6” and ordered up to XXL because of the Sizing Chart. The XXL waist band is very loose and I think it may stretch more as it’s worn. Will probably return them.
True to size - fit great - loved the white
Love them, very lightweight n comfy

I am in love with these joggers as well as another pant by Gradual that I use as work pants! I never have issues with the other pant I get, but these the sizing are always a guess. In the joggers, I have 5 pairs in them. I will say sizing is off constantly, you may need to buy then send back and re order. I usually wear a 10-12 in jeans, 8-12 in work pants. In these joggers I tried the small and medium; the small were so tight it was like leggings. I liked the lose fit of the medium, I kept them before recognizing they constantly fall down and I can’t have things in my pocket otherwise they fall right off. I usually wear these just for errands or bloated days. Reading more reviews, giving it 3 months, I ordered three more in size small. One fit perfectly, the other two were so small I sent them back. Waited a few weeks then ordered two in size small, got them today and they both fit perfectly! Ordering two more right now in the last colors.  These joggers are great and super versatile. You can have them as lounge/errands, as adventure days (I wear these hiking, kayaking, long boarding), the solid colors I have: I wear with my work tops/blouses for a more polished look, even adding a blouse with cardigan and dress shoes to run to the office. My favorite is wearing them high waisted with crop tops & sneakers for an easy weekend outfit that fits all the tasks/situations.
Very comfortable joggers made of super soft and stretchy material . They fit true to size and are lightweight. I will buy more.

These are soft and very comfortable. My only complaint is the leg length. It is a me problem though because I have long legs so it is hard to get something long enough. They land above my ankles and I like them to be a bit longer. I bought them in black as well and love them both. Easy to wash and dry. Live the pockets!
Love these.  Now have 3 pair and my favorite comfy pants
These are so comfortable and fits perfectly. I could have gotten an extra small run a bit big. I got a small Love them and we’ll be getting another pair in a different color.
I usually wear a medium 6 but ordered these in a small and still too big. Wish they would have worked. Very comfy and cute

These are nice.  They are soft, stretchy and comfortable as advertised.I'm happy with my purchase.  I ordered a medium and a small and kept the small. I think if you are in between sizes you could size down because of the stretch.  They are a little more fitted though like a legging fit.

评论概述: Good fit but length is not accurate
评论详情: The fit is good, waist and hip measurement guide is accurate however the length is 30” at best which is ok as an above the ankle jogger.

Like them a lot but I’m very petite and lean and found them a bit loose and the material a bit thin! The sawing seem in the back of the pants started to shed very quickly after using one time! Save the loose material and look like new!

I would truly give these joggers 10 stars, they are the best athleisure wear I’ve ever owned. The fit is amazing, I love that they are pull on vs. a drawstring waist and the front is flat. Incredibly comfortable, they are perfect for travel in any climate. The material is buttery soft. I plan on purchasing these in every color!!

In the last week, I’ve bought these joggers in 3 different colors because I love them so much! The waist band is super comfy and doesn’t fit uncomfortably or give you muffin top. They’re perfectly sized and adorable for fall!

The best travel pants I’ve ever worn. I wore these on 8 hour plane rides, walked all over France,  washed and hang dried them twice. Super light weight for summer travel.  Great with tennis shoes or flats. I have long legs and they came down about an inch above my ankles.  They are not too baggy and not to tight. Perfect.  I ordered another pair for the trip in olive green.
Great value. Good fit for a tall person. Comfortable active or lounge wear.
I ordered 2 pairs of these and I really like them.  They are comfortable and cute but not thick so I don't think I'd wear them in real cold weather!!!
The material is so soft and comfortable. The fit is perfect (5'6" - 140 lbs, got a medium). I love the hybrid yoga/joggers style, it's not too tight or too loose, and the pockets are so convenient!

评论概述: Good fit but not light weight
评论详情: I was looking for something for summer hiking. They aren’t breathable. I will wear them in the fall or spring. The fit is a bit bigger than I anticipated but they are comfortable. Easy care. Nice pockets. The material is polyester and spandex.

I really wanted this color. Color was great! But size was a bit too large.  They only offered a small and I usually wear an extra small but the measurements listed seemed to be ok. But they are just a little too large
These are so comfortable and flattering! I absolutely love them!

Needed a white pant and did not want a legging or jeans. Comfortable jogger, lightweight and nice material.  I think they’re too nice to workout in but a great dress down pant. (My opinion).  Will purchase another pair.

评论概述: Just What I Was Looking for
评论详情: I bought these 4 weeks post op and still unable to wear a regular waistband.  I've been living in a couple good pairs of leggings, but I don't like wearing leggings in public.  These joggers are nice quality.  It may sound odd, but the fabric makeup is almost like a thicker swimsuit.  I think they run true to size (maybe a bit bigger), but I sized up so I could have something more slacks-like just with the high waist and they were exactly as I wanted.  A couple things to note on fit: I'm 5' 3.5" and wear size 12 (or Large) pant .  The bulk of my 145lbs in hip/thigh so the XL waist is really baggy, causing the crotch to sag a bit.  Not a big issue for me since I'm not using them for working out.  I may have still been able to have some room in a Lg, but I'm quite happy with this overall. Length for me is comparable to jeans and do not balloon at the ankle.  I wouldn't want them any longer, though.
Very cool, comfortable material! True to size.

I love the comfort and fit of these joggers, except for the length! The material is soft, they are flattering, but the leg length is just a little too short - which I think is an acceptable look but as a baseball mom, if it is cool enough for pants, I want my legs covered.
5’8”, 150 lbs. ordered XL cuz didn’t want skin-tight fit. Cut is flattering and fitted, fabric lightweight.
Great versatile pant! Easy to Dress up or dress down. Would size down runs a little big!

I ordered these on a whim because the price was great. I’m tall (5’11), so pants rarely fit me purchasing online. These might be the comfiest pants I own!!!  The waistband is not tight and the fabric is very flattering. I didn’t give 5 stars because they are maybe a tad short for my long legs and definitely not for cold weather (however, both these complaints are more just a “me” thing:)). Even with those 2 complaints I am keeping them and plan to wear often!
Poor fabric, and pilling happened after wearing for a very short time.

These are so cute! They’re a great thicker quality material and shiny but not a tacky shiny if that makes sense. I got so many compliments on them at work. They washed and dried without shrinking or wrinkling. They’re true to size. I bought a medium and I’m 5’6, 155 lbs.

Not the pants I thought I had ordered but they are very comfortable and lots of leg room. I live in Tick country (NH) so I never wear shorts. These pants are light enough for hiking on warm days and they dry quickly. The ankle cuffs are super comfortable and I wear high socks.
I love the thick waistband!
Very nice fabric. Washes well and wares comfortable.

评论概述: G Gradual Women's Joggers High Waisted Yoga Pants with Pockets Loose Leggings for Women
评论详情: Buyer beware. A small is definitely a small. I am 5’ 0” tall 144lbs. The pants fit perfect around the waist.  Wish it had more leg room and that they were a little longer. I bought this pair because they resembled an Ideology brand that I purchased through Macy’s, they were close but the material was not as silky and smooth as I would have liked. The pants were delivered in a zippered plastic bag. No other wrapping.
Very comfortable. Super comfortable. Washes well

Needed some casual pants for everyday. These are great, They fit just like I want them to, like the photos, and they're very comfortable. The pockets are deep enough that I won't lose what I put in them, and they shipped very fast! Ordering more!
I’m 5’5” and these are really short.  Also as another reviewer pointed out, no drawstring to tighten waist as I am loosing weight. I am keeping, but won’t be able to wear long as I loose my weight.

评论概述: TTS. Bought a large thinking because of my size 8 big butt I'd need bigger.
评论详情: First these aren't tights or joggers. It's in between. So I made the mistake of getting a size large instead of medium thinking I'd get a comfy style -like some comments suggested. I'm age 40. size 8. 29 waist. 5'6" at 178 lbs, 41" hips, but I carry muscle and a ton of extra butt and wide latina hips. So I can have major sizing issues. These fit perfectly on my mom who is size 10. 5'4" 162lbs. 31 in jeans. Menopausal belly although she is a fit body type everywhere else. So I think go with your pants size rather than the baggy look. TTS if you're an hourglass figure. It does show cellulite but we both don't care about that. Because it's not much at all. She loved them. Soft smooth fabric, excellent quality, holds in the belly a bit and great stretch. Mom wants more colors now. I will see how the medium is on me and review those later. Loved how high the large went up, super high on the waist, so I hope it's the same, but, because I am an hourglass figure the waist width was a bit looser so it caused extra fabric to slide and bunch at the crotch & knees. Otherwise awesome. The color is boss. I LOVE muted lavenders and this is on the lighter side but perfect tone. Will definitely get a few of these for hiking in summer and for around the house. Also great stitching on seams. Strong hold and not tight or bulky at all. Only gripe is that it could be a bit longer on the ankles. And the camel toe seems to not be an issue unless you wear these really tight. But perfect nonetheless. If you're taller than me then these might get short on you but that's not a bad thing really.
